tmContent.summary: Currently, the page is not responsive, but I am working on changing that.
tmContent.modalContent: I have found some designs that do not have a mobile version.

tmContent.summary: The original design is on my GitHub page.
tmContent.modalContent: I loved the design of the page, that's why I created it.
For this slider, I was planning to do a more complex animation, but it would take too much time.

tmContent.summary: This project, like all my personal projects, has no backend.
tmContent.modalContent: Filtering by art type is done using JSON, which contains all the data for each publication.

tmContent.summary: This project is simple but effective, with a main page and several subpaths that facilitate navigation.
tmContent.modalContent: I have used React Router to manage routes efficiently, allowing fluid navigation between the different sections of the page.
